list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: break or cause to break forcibly into parts, especially into halves or along the grain.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the ice cracked and heaved and split
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Băng nứt và rụng và chia tay

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (with reference to a group of people) divide into two or more groups.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: let's split up and find the other two
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Chúng ta hãy chia tay và tìm hai người kia

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of one's head) suffer great pain from a headache.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: đầu của tôi đang chia tách

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a tear, crack, or fissure in something, especially down the middle or along the grain.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: light squeezed through a small split in the curtain
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Ánh sáng vắt qua một vết rách nhỏ trong rèm

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (in gymnastics and dance) an act of leaping in the air or sitting down with the legs straight and at right angles to the upright body, one in front and the other behind, or one at each side.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I could never do a split before
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi không bao giờ có thể làm một sự chia rẽ trước đây

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a thing that is divided or split.
the time it takes to complete a recognized part of a race, or the point in the race where such a time is measured.
